alert.note: Alert for Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Rio Grande; Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued March 05 at 1:09PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1000 PM SUNDAY UNTIL 500 PM SUNDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Saguache, Rio Grande, Alamosa, Costilla and Conejos Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Saguache, Del Norte, Alamosa, Conejos, and San Luis. WHEN...1000 PM Sunday March 05 to 500 PM Sunday March 05 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Sunday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by late Sunday afternoon. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Rio Grande; Saguache
